import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; export default function Home() { return (

ðŸŽ¬ Multiplex Theater Online Booking

Welcome to the online booking system. Browse movies, check schedules, and book your seats instantly.

Quick Navigation

  • View Movies & Schedules
  • Book Tickets (example schedule ID)
  • Book Tickets (example schedule ID)

How it works

  1. Go to Movies to see all currently listed films.
  2. Click View Schedules for your movie of choice.
  3. Pick a showtime and click Book Now.
  4. Confirm seats and get your m-ticket code instantly.

Developer Notes

  • Frontend: React + Axios + React Router
  • Backend: Node.js (Express) + MySQL
  • APIs: /api/movies, /api/bookings
); }
